description: A chunk of brimstone, the foundation of hell and all it's spawn. It radiates with magical energy, none of it pure.

name: knowing post
description: A crystal ball stuck onto a post so as to elevate it, giving it a clear view of the surroundings.

name: safe
description: A small, heavy, and near-unbreachable metal box with a rotary combination lock.  With something to listen really closely and a hell of a lot of time, you might be able to crack it.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: stone altar
description: This is a devilish stone altar.  Most commonly used in morally questionable rituals. That's made more obvious by the three human skulls crying blood.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: altar of power
description: An altar imprinted with a magic circle that makes almost all things much easier. It's laced with magic in it's entire construction, making it a necessary component in some high tier magical recipes.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: essential altar
description: An altar in worship of knowledge itself.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

The core of an infernal press that's been ripped straight out. Now that you're looking at it, you can tell it's just made of brimstone and crystallized mana, mixed so perfectly they're nearly indistinguishable. It radiates with magical energy, only some of it pure.

name: infernal press
description: A dastardly machine containing an element capable of turning regular paper into liquid magic. If only you knew how to do so...
A hundred hundred-dollar bills held together by a mustard currency strap. Most people have figured out by now that if you offer it as payment, a creature will come to your aid.
A medical syringe.  Used for administering intravenous drugs.
A gold and silver ring with a wide stamp attached to the band.  A long time ago, the stamp was legible, but now the patterns have faded into each other.
Some crystallized mana.  This can be reloaded into rechargeable mana crystals, but can never be unloaded.

Only one piece of the puzzle. A neatly paperclipped document sits face down on top of the file labeled 'Top Secret.' You can surmise from what's in the file itself that the Government before the cataclysm was trying to enslave demons and use them as a source of infinite power. You can also surmise that it did not go as planned. You'll need to remove the paperclip if you want to know more.

use_action.msg: You remove a paperclip from the intelligence, triggering some form of magical alarm and forcing most of the intelligence to self-destruct. You're left holding a paperclipped document.

use_action.message: You preen the intel for locations of interest.

description: A sliver of brimstone, the foundation of hell and all it's spawn. The stuff that demons eat, shit and bleed. It radiates with magical energy, none of it pure.
A hundred-dollar bill, featuring a portrait of Benjamin Franklin.

name: piloting (beginner)
description: You practice winging it.
An extremely pandering book that quickly describes how to fly a helicoptor. The book recommends a lot of practice.

A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. It can be used to draw a crystal circle, one of the many wonders of magic. This unpigmented base is used all throughout the process of spellwriting.
A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. It can be used to draw a circle of flame, one of the many wonders of magic.
A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. It can be used to draw a circle of blood, one of the many wonders of magic.
A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. It can be used to draw a circle of smoke, one of the many wonders of magic.
A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. It can be used to draw a circle of bile, one of the many wonders of magic.

name: Draw Crystal Circle
description: You allow mana to flow through the ink and raw magic to incarnate.

name: Draw Circle of Flame
description: You allow mana to flow through the ink and raw magic to incarnate.

name: Draw Circle of Blood
description: You allow mana to flow through the ink and raw magic to incarnate.

name: Draw Circle of Smoke
description: You allow mana to flow through the ink and raw magic to incarnate.

name: Draw Circle of Bile
description: You allow mana to flow through the ink and raw magic to incarnate.
Bleached mercury mixed thoroughly with crystallized mana. Anything written with it comes out invisible, but it has multiple magical applications.

name: drawing of a wolf
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a wolf, black as the night.

name: Mana-Painted Wolf
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name: drawing of a balrog
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a fiery nightmare consisting entirely of shadow.

name: Mana-Painted Balrog
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name: drawing of a troll
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a troll, dumbly guarding a bridge.

name: Mana-Painted Troll
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name: drawing of gelatin
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a formless and ever growing gelatin.

name: Mana-Painted Gelatin
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name: drawing of a dragon
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a dragon, hungrily smiling at the artist.

name: Mana-Painted Dragon
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name: drawing of a great artist
description: A drawing of crystallized ink on parchment of a renowned artist, gleefully painting away. A skilled mage can cast it into an animate magic circle in order to summon it.

name: Mana-Painted Artist
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.
A drawing of an eye that you can't quite pin down. One moment it appears warm and inviting, and the next cold and alien. Activate it to reveal a small area within a massive range for a brief time.
A drawing spiraling infinitely outward. Activate it to push everything away from a target.

name: Mana-Painted Outward Spiral
description: You let a small amount of raw mana flow outwards.
A drawing spiraling infinitely inward. Activate it to pull everything toward a target magic circle.

name: Mana-Painted Inward Spiral
description: You let a small amount of raw mana flow outwards.
A drawing that only seems partially real, you could swear that clock is ticking... Activate it to freeze creatures in time.

name: Mana-Painted Clock
description: You create a localized anti-vibrational field, locking those inside when the spell is cast in place for a brief period of time.
A drawing of bile dripping from what remains. Activate it to detonate an area, causing an explosion of magic at it's location.

name: Mana-Painted Bile
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.
A drawing of smoke in the aftermath. Activate it to detonate an area, causing an explosion of magic at it's location.

name: Mana-Painted Smoke
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.
A drawing of blood slowly leaking off the page into nowhere. Activate it to detonate an area, causing an explosion of magic at it's location.

name: Mana-Painted Blood
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.
A drawing of flames lapping at the shores of destruction. Activate it to detonate an area, causing an explosion of magic at it's location.

name: Mana-Painted Flame
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.
A drawing of nothing, or at least that's what it looks like. Activate it to detonate an area, causing an explosion of magic at it's location.

name: Mana-Painted Razing
description: You use mana instead of white pen ink to draw.

name.str: drawing of a spotlight from the sky

description: A drawing of a beam shooting down from the sky onto a humanoid figure. Activate it to create a translocate gate on a nearby, animate magic circle and then translocate.

name: Mana-Painted Gate
description: Utilitzing a massive burst of mana you conjure a translocation gate into existence. Doing so leaves you feeling drained for the day.
A drawing of a figure moving too fast to keep track of. Activating it will allow one to swap places with a creature within a huge area.

name: Mana-Painted Step
description: Teleports you to a target location.
A drawing of faces that are themselves made of faces making up one of the faces. Activate it to become invincible for 30 seconds.
Dislocates target area from reality for a brief moment, potentially disregarding the physical realm.

name: Devil's Tax
description: Got ya.
A spell of blessing that gives you energy and boosts your abilities.

name: Meditation
description: Meditation
A transluscent handful of a water-like substance that always twinkles with a rainbow of colors. Holding it blesses you with health, and drinking it would purify your spirit.
A fragment of a soul, barely luminescent and slowly turning to nothing. While it's in your hand you feel less tired, and using it will drain your willpower for the day to keep you going now.

name: Recover stamina
description: Drain Soul

name: Recover fatigue
description: Recovers fatigue
Each of these mithril coins has a profile of Valzain winking.
A deflated ball or a doll with it's head pulled off, this lost dream would make for the perfect symbol for sadness.
A custom made rack tailored by a skilled mage to be able to hold more than it should. The weight of objects inside is not disregarded.

You have absorbed the contract of Ortiel, stealing it's power at no cost to your self. You feel stronger and faster in combat. The contract clearly states the terms of it's release; at the foot of the Prince of Darkness.

You have absorbed the contract of Omnath, stealing it's power at no cost to your self. You feel much more perceptive of magic. The contract clearly states the terms of it's release; at the foot of the Prince of Darkness.

You have absorbed the contract of Omnath, stealing it's power at no cost to your self. You feel dextrous and vigorous energy all throughout your body. The contract clearly states the terms of it's release; at the foot of the Prince of Darkness.

You have absorbed the contract of Atraxa, stealing it's power at no cost to your self. You feel intellectually keen to your own health. The contract clearly states the terms of it's release; at the foot of the Prince of Darkness.

A dimly glowing soul, slowly turning over and over in itself. This soul is heavy with a life of pain. A skilled mage could siphon more mana from it. Using it will permanently increase your maximum mana.

name: Absorb Essence
description: Recovers mana
You have absorbed the essence of a mage, making yourself more powerful in the process.

A dimly glowing soul, slowly turning over and over in itself. This soul is leaking magic, but perhaps a more skilled wizard could wrench even more mana from it... Using it will increase your maximum mana.

name: Absorb Essence
description: Recover mana
You have absorbed the essence of a mage, making yourself more powerful in the process.
A dimly glowing soul, slowly turning over and over in itself. It is absolutely drenched in magic. No mage could tear more magic from it. Using it will increase your maximum mana.

name: Absorb Essence
description: Recover mana
You have absorbed the essence of a mage, making yourself more powerful in the process.
You have absorbed so much of the essential essence of what it means to be a mage that you are drowning in mana.
A leather-back journal for preserving notes and maps, has a strap to keep loose pages contained.

A dragon-backed journal for preserving notes and maps, has a dragon essence strap to keep loose pages contained. Magically holds more paper than it should. Only the most esteemed wizard would require such a regal logbook.

A snippet from 'Modern Day Magic,' the most prolific newspaper just before the end of days. In a shocking turn, the paper is reporting numerous unexplainable events in the days before, including ghost sightings and changes in behavior to the magically inclined.  Perhaps the strangest of the developments is the government's complete silence on specifically the leather-skinned creatures that are being sighted all around the world. Drugs are running rampant through the city and the government refuses to comment, but at least the economy is doing well.

Job ads fill the pages of this months old newspaper, from in-factory burger flippers to paracausal researchers. In fact, most of them are for paracausal research. There's also advertisements on nearly every page, mostly for spells and such to be purchased through mail-in coupons. In the back is an advertisement for budding wizards to join 'an Order of Silver and Gold.'
TAKE OFF THE DAMNNIT CROSS DAMMIT. BLOOD NEED BE BIG. HAS TO HURT! zeus... POWER... zeus.... OH! BURY ME! BURY ME!!! COMMUNION!

effect.u_message: You get sucked into the envelope.

description: A letter with the words 'DONT DEAD, OPEN INSIDE' written in blood on the front.
A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. Pa's barn burns but as the sun rises you lose that hellspawn behind the flames.
A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. The knife falls out of the burning man's chest as his boiling arm pierces your chest.
A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. The hunger pushed you to try and eat one of these things. Then it pushed you to make arrows out of their stone skin.
A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. The Robinson's always had good mail.

A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. We gotta get the people together man, me and you... I used to work for my Dad's firm, and they had these passes that could teach you how to translocate... Could bring those cave dwarves back here...

A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. I was a sailor... The ship was pretty calm when the shit hit the fan but as the days went on... Well, I'm still alive at least. Wouldn't be if that guy hadn't shown up and turned the place into his personal beachfront property, heh.
A scrap of paper with a memory imprinted on it. A fist clenches a cross as a blade slides across the other, lightning cracking overhead.
A brief contract binding an entity to a higher, or perhaps lower, power.
A seal stamped in Color itself, beckoning directly to the lowest reach. The foolish might cast it into the blood of an animate circle, binding the creditor to their will for a brief period.

name: Flesh and Blood
description: Meditation leaves you weary for the day.
A piece ripped off of the devil themself. It oozes souls constantly, and would sell for a very pretty penny to the right buyer.

A lone tear, glistening so brightly that it could only drop from an innocent eye. Essentially sadness. Crush in the palm of your hand to ground yourself into this reality, keeping you from drifting into the land of dreams.
